channel.title: Posts on Anthony Franklin
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Anthony Franklin

item.title: Welcome
item.description: Welcome I am an junior data analyst who seeks future education in the data science field. I graduated from Shippensburg University with a bachelors in sociology. I want to add my experience from my degree to gain experience in the data science field about everyday society.

item.title: Display Jupyter Notebooks with Academic
item.description: Learn how to blog in Academic using Jupyter notebooks

item.title: Academic: the website builder for Hugo
item.description: Create a beautifully simple website in under 10 minutes.
